channel.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
channel.description:
1. How come when I spawn obsidian cloak and white gloves I disc and that account freezes whenever I log it on? 2. How do I config NPCs so they have more than 0 hp and can talk and stuff? 3. How do I make all the monsters in the game come back or do I just spawn them myself? 4. How do I edit my char's stats so they aren't all 99? 5. Why cant I see the thingy when I click on one of my stats, e.g. attack, and see what stuff I can weild etc.? 6. if you answer all these I will be very happy! 7. very very happy! 8. I might add more later! 9. those last 3 weren't questions sorry!
~~~SP~~~

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Surfingpikachao:

I don’t have a server I just click the one to the left and then mess around hehe, gonna create a private server when I know what the hell I’m doing. and thanks.

LOL ok you dont need to know anything i said if you dont have your own server.

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

To remove the npc, Go to autospawn.cfg.

Find the NPC’s ID and remove the whole line that the Npc is on.

I dont know why it dosent say password incorrect. Does your server even save your accounts?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @Surfingpikachao Surfingpikachao
item.description:
@Surfingpikachao wrote:

How do I remove the npc without being in game?

Oh and how come when I put in the wrong pass for a character on my local server instead of saying wrong pass it creates a new char over the old one with the different pass?! there a way to stop this?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Some times that happens to me, when i log in i log straight back out because the Npc is glitched.

remove the npc and add a new one. Or when you get in range of that npc it will disconnect you automatically. :o

Read full topic

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @Surfingpikachao Surfingpikachao
item.description:
@Surfingpikachao wrote:

OK found that. thx. oh but also. How can I stop it from disconnecting me and not letting me back on when I try to place an npc where it wont fit? Sorry to be such a n00b but I’m sure this will be my last question! thx for all ur help!

Read full topic

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Its in the MAIN folder like right when you open the Folder for your whole server. The char file should be on top it should just say “characters”.

item.title: Questions and hopefully answers?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

[quote=“Surfingpikachao, post:1, topic:89808”]1. How come when I spawn obsidian cloak and white gloves I disc and that account freezes whenever I log it on?
2. How do I config NPCs so they have more than 0 hp and can talk and stuff?
3. How do I make all the monsters in the game come back or do I just spawn them myself?
4. How do I edit my char’s stats so they aren’t all 99?
5. Why cant I see the thingy when I click on one of my stats, e.g. attack, and see what stuff I can weild etc.?
6. if you answer all these I will be very happy!
7. very very happy!
8. I might add more later!
9. those weren’t questions sorry!

~SP~[/quote]
Answers

[ul][li]1. those items could be glitched. Make sure thats the only items you spawned. It could be different ones.[/li]

[li]2. Go to npc.cfg edit there levels and Hit points.[/li]

[li]3.The monsters should auto respawn if not try to find a way. Or get a new source.[/li]

[li]4.Go to the Character file. Find your guys name. Edit hits stats.[/li]

[li]5.You need to have that coded into your client.java. So that it shows what you can weild, plant,fish etc.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
